articles.author: Tonia Nissen
articles.title: Canadian Scientist Goes Back in Time Using the World's Biggest Space Telescope - Optic Flux
articles.description: A group of astrophysicists may soon have a key to unraveling the puzzle of life's beginnings. On December 25, the James Webb Space Telescope was launched into orbit from French Guiana, South America. Webb is the biggest and most powerful space telescope ever …
articles.content:
A group of astrophysicists may soon have a key to unraveling the puzzle of life’s beginnings.
On December 25, the James Webb Space Telescope was launched into orbit from French Guiana, South America… [+3138 chars]
